nodes.bodyText: Can we call this serviceConfiguration to match S3BaseClientBuilder#serviceConfiguration?
Why is disabling checksum validation required?
This is just carrying forward the existing default this class was using on line 292. To be honest, I'm not real sure why it is set that way to begin with.
Can we test all possible flags of S3Configuration?

Nice! Thanks for testing this.
For the other features:

pathStyleAccessEnabled, useArnRegionEnabled both affect the endpoint. If they're working, can we add a test for them? If they're not working, maybe we should throw an exception if they're configured.
chunkedEncodingEnabled and checksumValidationEnabled don't make sense for presigned requests right now. Can we add some javadoc to mention that they currently aren't used for presigning?
Can we include the javadoc here as well? I see you added it to the concrete implementation already.
